text: Iwao Miyajima (2 May 1914 - 21 June 2005) was a Japanese ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Japanese male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Japan Category:Ski jumpers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Iwao Miyajima
